casebody.data:
SCIGRIP, INC., et al.
v.
OSAE, et al. 139A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 2, 2019 K. Edward Greene, Attorney at Law, Benjamin Thompson, Attorney at Law, Tobias S. Hampson, Attorney at Law, J. Blakely Kiefer, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for SciGrip, Inc., et al. George B. Mast, Attorney at Law, Charles D. Mast, Attorney at Law, Lily VP. Tuttle, Attorney at Law, Smithfield, Clint Mast, Attorney at Law, for Osae, Samuel B. Philip Strach, Attorney at Law, Brodie D. Erwin, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Scott Bader, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of December 2018 by Tobias Hampson to Withdraw as Appellate Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of January 2019."
